title: Support ranges in the probability Stream Evaluator
description: Currently the probability Stream Evaluator only accepts a single parameter to return the probability of a specific value. This only works with discrete probability distributions. This ticket will add support for specifying the range for computing probability. This will allow the probability function to work with continuous probability distributions.
